## CategoryProducts interface

The category products object returned in the Category query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CategoryProducts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [items?](./magento-api.categoryproducts.items.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[ProductInterface](./magento-api.productinterface.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of products that are assigned to the category. |
|  [page\_info?](./magento-api.categoryproducts.page_info.md) | Maybe&lt;[SearchResultPageInfo](./magento-api.searchresultpageinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An object that includes the page\_info and currentPage values specified in the query. |
|  [total\_count?](./magento-api.categoryproducts.total_count.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The number of products in the category that are marked as visible. By default, in complex products, parent products are visible, but their child products are not. |
